question: The two terms Cyclone-30 and Faraday Cup were making news recently. With which of the following, they are closely associated?
explanation: Cyclotrons are used to produce radioisotopes for diagnostic and therapeutic use for cancer care. Cyclone-30, the biggest cyclotron in India based in Kolkata for medical application has recently become operational when 30 MeV (million electron volt) beam reached the Faraday Cup – a metal cup designed to catch charged particles in vacuum.
